sourcesContent:
<template></template>

<script>
import PostService from "../PostService";

export default {
  name: "PostComponent",
  data() {
    return {
      posts: [],
      error: "",
      text: "",
    };
  },
  async create() {
    try {
      this.posts = await PostService.getPosts;
    } catch (err) {}
  },
};
</script>

<!-- Add "scoped" attribute to limit CSS to this component only -->
<style scoped>
h3 {
  margin: 40px 0 0;
}
ul {
  list-style-type: none;
  padding: 0;
}
li {
  display: inline-block;
  margin: 0 10px;
}
a {
  color: #42b983;
}
</style>
